title: Is a doubt clearing session available at Aakash Institute? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hii…. I studied at Aakash institute Allahabad There is doubt class after the regular class get over… Also you can go any time to clear your doubts Especially … Rajesh sir chemistry department is awesome & Abhilash sir for mathematics was my favourite…. . . . They all are supportive… Thankyou
No. Ask diring classes. Or directly approach to teacher(s) of the subject during your n their free time
